title: Rito plz what is this

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: well i just bought bard with ip and this is what happend, xD. Anyone got a explanation?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a visual bug, and doesn't affect that actual amounts of IP/RP that you currently have. 

Relogging should fix this!
Something similar happened with me, but it seemed to fix itself when I relogged. No idea what could cause it, though haha.
lol yeah i just restarted and it got fixed. it was hilarious though
happened to me but with rp
It happened to me as well when I bought Bard and my friend when he got DJ Sona. It seems to just be a visual glitch that fixes itself when you relog
